Author: Jesse
Quote: I don't know, I think that if I could just accept the fact that my life is supposed to be difficult. You know, that's what to be expected, then I might not get so pissed-off about it and I'll just be glad when something nice happens.

Author: Celine
Quote: Each time I wear black, or like, lose my temper, or say anything about anything, you know, they always go, "Oh it's so French. It's so cute." Ugh! I hate that!

Author: Celine
Quote: I used to think that if none of your family or friends knew you were dead, it was like not really being dead. People can invent the best and the worst for you.

Author: Celine
Quote: If there's any kind of magic in this world it must be in the attempt of understanding someone sharing, something. I know, it's almost impossible to succeed .... but who cares really? The answer must be in the attempt.

Author: Jesse
Quote: Why is it, that a dog, sleeping in the sun, is so beautiful, y'know, it is, it's beautiful, but a guy, standing at a bank machine, trying to take some money out, looks like a complete moron?

Author: Celine
Quote: I always feel this pressure of being a strong and independent icon of womanhood, and without making it look my whole life is revolving around some guy. But loving someone, and being loved means so much to me. We always make fun of it and stuff. But isn't everything we do in life a way to be loved a little more?

Author: Celine
Quote: Even though I reject most of the religious things I can't help but feeling for all those people that come here lost or in pain, guilt, looking for some kind of answers. It fascinates me how a single place can join so much pain and happiness for so many generations.

Author: Jesse
Quote: Everybody's parents fucked them up. Rich kids parents gave them too much. Poor kids, not enough. You know, too much attention, not enough attention. They either left them or they stuck around and taught them the wrong things.

Author: Jesse
Quote: Sometimes I dream about being a good father and a good husband. And sometimes it feels really close. But then other times it seems silly like it would ruin my whole life. And it's not just a fear of commitment or that I'm incapable of caring or loving because... I can. It's just that, if I'm totally honest with myself I think I'd rather die knowing that I was really good at something. That I had excelled in some way than that I'd just been in a nice, caring relationship.

Author: Celine
Quote: I believe if there's any kind of God it wouldn't be in any of us, not you or me but just this little space in between. If there's any kind of magic in this world it must be in the attempt of understanding someone sharing something. I know, it's almost impossible to succeed but who cares really? The answer must be in the attempt.

Author: Celine
Quote: Isn't everything we do in life a way to be loved a little more?

Author: Celine
Quote: You don't want to see me again?

Author: Jesse
Quote: No, of course I do. If somebody gave me the choice right now of to never see you again or to marry you, I would marry you.

Author: Celine
Quote: Then it's like some male fantasy.Meet a French girl in train, fuck her and never see her again.

Author: Celine
Quote: Well, he convinced me. I mean, actually, I was ready to get off the train with him after talking to him a short while. He was so sweet, I couldn't help it.In the lounge car, he began to talk about him as a boy seeing his great grandmother's ghost.I think that's when I fell for him.Just the idea of this little boy with all those beautiful dreams.He trapped me. And he's so cute.He has beautiful blue eyes, nice pink lips, greasy hair.I love it.He is kind of tall, and he's a little clumsy.I like to feel his eyes on me when I look away.He kind of kisses like an adolescent. It's so cute.

Author: Jesse
Quote: You know what drives me crazy? It's all these people talking about how great technology is, and how it saves all this time. But, what good is saved time, if nobody uses it? If it just turns into more busy work. You never hear somebody say, "With the time I've saved by using my word processor, I'm gonna go to a Zen monastery and hang out". I mean, you never hear that.

Author: Celine
Quote: The only person I could really hurt is myself.

Author: Celine
Quote: I AM THE MOST HARMLESS PERSON....ONLY PERSON I CAN THINK OF HURTING IS MYSELF

Author: Celine
Quote: When you talked earlier about after a few years how a couple would begin to hate each other by anticipating their reactions or getting tired of their mannerisms- I think it would be the opposite for me. I think I can really fall in love when I know everything about someone-the way he's going to part his hair, which shirt he's going to wear that day, knowing the exact story he'd tell in a given situation. I'm sure that's when I know I'm really in love.

Author: Jesse
Quote: People always talk about how love is this totally unselfish, giving thing, but if you think about it, there's nothing more selfish.

Author: Jesse
Quote: OK, well this was my thought: 50,000 years ago, there are not even a million people on the planet. 10,000 years ago, there's, like, two million people on the planet. Now there's between five and six billion people on the planet, right? Now, if we all have our own, like, individual, unique soul, right, where do they all come from? You know, are modern souls only a fraction of the original souls? 'Cause if they are, that represents a 5,000 to 1 split of each soul in the last 50,000 years, which is, like, a blip in the Earth's time. You know, so at best we're like these tiny fractions of people, you know, walking... I mean, is that why we're so scattered? You know, is that why we're all so specialized?

Author: Celine
Quote: Isn't everything we do in life a way to be loved a little more?

Author: Jesse
Quote: I know happy couples... but I think they lie to each other.

Author: Celine
Quote: I like to feel his eyes on me when I look away.

Quote: believe if there's any kind of God it wouldn't be in any of us, not you or me but just this little space in between. Author: Celine
Quote: Even being alone-- it's better than being with a lover and feeling lonely.

Author: Celine
Quote: The true work of improving things is in the little achievements of the day, and that's what you need to enjoy.

Author: Jesse
Quote: Happiness is in doing, not in getting what you want.

Author: Jesse
Quote: We all see the world through our own tiny keyhole.

Author: Jesse
Quote: I...I...I thought I was gonna totally lose it in there. When I first saw you...I mean, how did you even know I was going to be here?

Author: Celine
Quote: Well, it's my favorite bookstore in Paris. I, um...You can sit down for hours and read. I love it. There's fleas, but, you know...

Author: Jesse
Quote: I heard this story once about when the Germans were occupying Paris and they had to retreat back. They wired Notre Dame to blow, but they had to leave one guy in charge of hitting the switch. And the guy, the soldier, he couldn't do it. You know, he just sat there, knocked out by how beautiful the place was. And then when the allied troops came in, they found all the explosives just lying there and the switch unturned, and they found the same thing at Sacre Couer, Eiffel Tower. Couple other places I think...

Author: Jesse
Quote: I don't know. I always liked the story, though.

Author: Jesse
Quote: Skinnier, I think. A little thinner.

Author: Celine
Quote: Did you think I was fat before?

Author: Celine
Quote: Yeah, you thought I was a fatty. No, you thought I was a fatty! Yeah, you, you wrote a book about a fat French girl!

Author: Jesse
Quote: So that night was like a sad memory for you?

Author: Jesse
Quote: Oh, God, why didn't we exchange phone numbers and stuff? Why didn't we do that?

Author: Celine
Quote: Because we were young and stupid.

Author: Jesse
Quote: Do you think we still are?

Author: Celine
Quote: I guess when you're young, you just believe there'll be many people with whom you'll connect with. Later in life, you realize it only happens a few times.

Author: Jesse
Quote: And you can screw it up, you know, misconnect

Author: Celine
Quote: Memories are wonderful things, if you don't have to deal with the past.

Author: Jesse
Quote: In the months leading up to my wedding, I was thinking about you all the time. I mean, even on my way there; I'm in the car, a buddy of mine is driving me downtown and I'm staring out the window, and I think I see you, not far from the church, right? Folding up an umbrella and walking into a deli on the corner of 13th and Broadway. And I thought I was going crazy, but now I think it probably was you.

Author: Celine
Quote: I lived on 11th and Broadway.

Author: Jesse
Quote: Life's hard. It's supposed to be. If we didn't suffer, we'd never learn anything.

Author: Celine
Quote: I'm dying inside...I'm dying because I'm so numb. I don't feel pain or excitement, I'm not even bitter, I'm just...

Author: Jesse
Quote: You think you're the one dyin' inside? My life... is 24/7 bad.

Author: Celine
Quote: How have I changed?

Author: Jesse
Quote: You used to wear your hair down

Author: Celine
Quote: Oh you mean like that (releases her hair from her ponytail), What else?

Author: Jesse
Quote: You face is thinner...

Author: Celine
Quote: Baby, you are gonna miss that plane.

Author: Jesse
Quote: Look, I am just so happy, all right, to be with you.I am. I am so glad you didn't forget about me, okay?

Author: Celine
Quote: No, I didn't. And it pisses me off, okay? You come here to paris all romantic, and married.Okay? Screw you.

Author: Celine
Quote: You realize that most of the people that you meet are trying to get somewhere better, trying to make a little bit more cash, trying to get a little more respect, have more people admire them, you know...it's just exhausting!

Quote: There are so many things I want to do, but I end up doing not much.

Quote: You can never replace anyone because everyone is made up of such beautiful specific details.

Author: Celine
Quote: So, I want to try something.

Author: Celine
Quote: [hugs him] I want to see if you stay together or if you dissolve into molecules.

Author: Jesse
Quote: Good, I like being here.

Author: Jesse
Quote: I feel like I'm running a small nursery with someone I used to date.

Author: Jesse
Quote: I'm designed to feel slightly dissatisfied!

Author: Jesse

Quote: Who wants to be Joan of Ark? She was burned at the stake and a virgin.

Quote: We all get dragged through our parents' lives.

Quote: Now I know why Sylvia Plath put her head in a toaster.

Quote: It was an oven.

Quote: The world is fucked by unemotional, rational men deciding shit.

Author: Jesse
Quote: God knows he has many problems and has struggled his whole life connecting and being present, even with those he loves the most. And for that he is deeply sorry. But you are his only hope.

Quote: One of the perks of being over 35 is that you don't get raped as much.

Author: Celine
Quote: Well, it must be one hell of a night we're about to have.

Author: Natalia
Quote: It's just like our life, we appear and we disappear. We are so important to some, but we are just passing through.

Author: Jesse
Quote: But i also know that you love me. And i'm okay with you being a complicated human being. I don't want to live a boring life, where two people own each other, where two people are institutionalized in a box that others created because that is a bunch of stifling bullshit.

Author: Jesse
Quote: I'm giving you my whole life, okay? I got nothing larger to give. I'm not giving it to anybody else. If you're looking for permission to disqualify me, I'm not gonna give it to you. Okay? I love you. And I'm not in conflict about it, okay?

Author: Jesse
Quote: I wish you would find the time. You somehow manage to find the time to complain about 8 hours a day. I mean, I love the way you sing, okay. I fucked up my whole life cause of the way you sing. Alright? If you took 1/8th of the energy that you spend on bitching, whinning and worrying, if you put that energy into plain scales you would be like... fucking Django Reinhardt.

Quote: This is how relationships start falling apart.

Quote: I feel close to you.

Quote: But sometimes I don't know I feel like you're breathing helium, and I'm breathing oxygen.
